alert.note: Alert for Knox; Sullivan (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 26 at 9:05PM EST until March 07 at 5:17PM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Illinois...Indiana... Wabash River at Riverton. Wabash River at Montezuma. Wabash River at Covington. Wabash River at Lafayette. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Illinois...Indiana... Wabash River at Terre Haute. Wabash River at Hutsonville Legacy Power Plant Site. Wabash River at Clinton. .Rainfall amounts of one and one and a half to over three inches earlier last week brought lowland flooding to the Wabash River. With more rain in the forecast over the next few days, these conditions could persist into the middle of next week or longer in some locations. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL TUESDAY, MARCH 07... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wabash River at Hutsonville Legacy Power Plant Site. * WHEN...Until Tuesday, March 07. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, Seep water occurs behind levees on Indiana side. Hutson Creek begins to overflow from backwater. Old Darwin Road and a few rural roads in eastern Clark and Crawford counties in Illinois are impassable. Low agricultural land floods. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - There is no current observed data. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 18.7 feet early Saturday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Tuesday, March 07. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
